member.name: T:EI.API.ProcessLogging.Model.ActivityTypeV1
member.summary: An Activity Type defines a specific type of process that can be logged by the Process Logging application. Examples of Activity Types could include "Receive File", "Send File", "Perform FHIR Call", etc.

member.name: P:EI.API.ProcessLogging.Model.ActivityTypeV1.Type
member.summary: A unique code that identifies the type, used for readability and programmatic access.

member.name: P:EI.API.ProcessLogging.Model.ActivityTypeV1.IsInbound
member.summary: Flag that indicates that the activity was triggered by an external actor, for example an external system pushing a file to an application on the platform, or making an API call to the platform.

member.name: P:EI.API.ProcessLogging.Model.ActivityTypeV1.IsOutbound
member.summary: Flag that indicates that the activity was triggered by an application on the platform, for example the application exporting a file, or making an API call to an external system.

member.name: P:EI.API.ProcessLogging.Model.ActivityTypeV1.Name
member.summary: The name of the Activity Type for the specified .

member.name: P:EI.API.ProcessLogging.Model.ActivityTypeV1.Description
member.summary: An optional description of the Activity Type for the specified .

member.name: T:EI.API.ProcessLogging.Model.FileProcessLogV1
member.summary: A specific variant of a that is used to log the processing of a file.

member.name: P:EI.API.ProcessLogging.Model.FileProcessLogV1.ProcessLogId
member.summary: The ID of the that this File Process Log is associated with.

member.name: P:EI.API.ProcessLogging.Model.FileProcessLogV1.FileName
member.summary: The name of the file that this Process Log is associated with.

member.name: P:EI.API.ProcessLogging.Model.FileProcessLogV1.FilePath
member.summary: The path of the file that this Process Log is associated with, typically a URI to the file in a Storage Account.

member.name: P:EI.API.ProcessLogging.Model.FileProcessLogV1.FileSize
member.summary: The (optional) size of the file in bytes.

member.name: P:EI.API.ProcessLogging.Model.FileProcessLogV1.FileHash
member.summary: The (optional) SHA3-256 hash of the file, used for file integrity checking.

member.name: P:EI.API.ProcessLogging.Model.FileProcessLogV2.PurposeName
member.summary: The lookup name of the purpose of this file (FK to FilePurpose).

member.name: P:EI.API.ProcessLogging.Model.FileProcessLogV2.ProcessStatus
member.summary: The lookup status of this file (FK to ProcessStatus).

member.name: T:EI.API.ProcessLogging.Model.MessageLevelV1
member.summary: Represents the severity of a message, used to categorize messages and determine how they should be displayed and interpreted.

member.name: P:EI.API.ProcessLogging.Model.MessageLevelV1.Level
member.summary: A unique code that identifies the level, used for readability and programmatic access.

member.name: P:EI.API.ProcessLogging.Model.MessageLevelV1.Name
member.summary: The name of the Message Level for the specified .

member.name: P:EI.API.ProcessLogging.Model.MessageLevelV1.Description
member.summary: An optional description of the Message Level for the specified .

member.name: T:EI.API.ProcessLogging.Model.ProcessLogMessageV1
member.summary: Messages describing the actions that occurred while the Process was active

member.name: P:EI.API.ProcessLogging.Model.ProcessLogMessageV1.ProcessLogId
member.summary: The ID of the that this Message is associated with.

member.name: P:EI.API.ProcessLogging.Model.ProcessLogMessageV1.Level
member.summary: The Level of message, indicating the severity or importance of the message.

member.name: P:EI.API.ProcessLogging.Model.ProcessLogMessageV1.Message
member.summary: The message text.

member.name: P:EI.API.ProcessLogging.Model.ProcessLogMessageV1.MessageTimestamp
member.summary: The UTC timestamp of when this message was created.

member.name: P:EI.API.ProcessLogging.Model.ProcessLogMessageV2.FileProcessLogId
member.summary: The ID of the that this Message is associated with.

member.name: P:EI.API.ProcessLogging.Model.ProcessLogV1.Type
member.summary: The Activity Type that this Process Log entry describes.

member.name: P:EI.API.ProcessLogging.Model.ProcessLogV1.Status
member.summary: The Process Status of this Process Log entry.

member.name: P:EI.API.ProcessLogging.Model.ProcessLogV1.StartTimestamp
member.summary: The UTC timestamp of when this process was started.

member.name: P:EI.API.ProcessLogging.Model.ProcessLogV1.LastUpdatedTimestamp
member.summary: The UTC timestamp of the last time this Process Log had activity.

member.name: T:EI.API.ProcessLogging.Model.ProcessStatusV1
member.summary: Describes the status of a , for example "In Progress", "Completed", "Failed", etc.

member.name: P:EI.API.ProcessLogging.Model.ProcessStatusV1.Status
member.summary: The Process Status of this Process Log entry.

member.name: P:EI.API.ProcessLogging.Model.ProcessStatusV1.Name
member.summary: The name of the Status for the specified .

member.name: P:EI.API.ProcessLogging.Model.ProcessStatusV1.Description
member.summary: An optional description of the Status for the specified .

member.name: T:EI.API.ProcessLogging.Model.X12FunctionalGroupV1
member.summary: Represents an EDI X12 Functional Group, which is a collection of one or more EDI X12 Transaction Sets within an EDI X12 Interchange.

member.name: T:EI.API.ProcessLogging.Model.X12InterchangeV1
member.summary: Represents an EDI X12 Functional Group, which is a collection of one or more EDI X12 Transaction Sets within an EDI X12 Interchange.

member.name: T:EI.API.ProcessLogging.Model.X12MessageV1
member.summary: Messages describing the actions that occurred while the Process was active

member.name: P:EI.API.ProcessLogging.Model.X12MessageV1.X12InterchangeId
member.summary: The ID of the that this Message is associated with.

member.name: P:EI.API.ProcessLogging.Model.X12MessageV1.X12FunctionalGroupId
member.summary: The ID of the that this Message is associated with. This only has a value if the message is associated with a Functional Group.

member.name: P:EI.API.ProcessLogging.Model.X12MessageV1.X12TransactionSetId
member.summary: The ID of the that this Message is associated with. This only has a value if the message is associated with a Transaction Set.

member.name: P:EI.API.ProcessLogging.Model.X12MessageV1.Level
member.summary: The Level of message, indicating the severity or importance of the message.

member.name: P:EI.API.ProcessLogging.Model.X12MessageV1.Message
member.summary: The message text.

member.name: P:EI.API.ProcessLogging.Model.X12MessageV1.MessageTimestamp
member.summary: The UTC timestamp of when this message was created.

member.name: T:EI.API.ProcessLogging.Model.X12StatusV1
member.summary: Describes the status of a , , or , for example "In Progress", "Completed", "Failed", etc.

member.name: P:EI.API.ProcessLogging.Model.X12StatusV1.Status
member.summary: The Status of the X12 entity.

member.name: P:EI.API.ProcessLogging.Model.X12StatusV1.Name
member.summary: The name of the Status for the specified .

member.name: P:EI.API.ProcessLogging.Model.X12StatusV1.Description
member.summary: An optional description of the Status for the specified .

member.name: T:EI.API.ProcessLogging.Model.X12TransactionSetV1
member.summary: Represents an EDI X12 Functional Group, which is a collection of one or more EDI X12 Transaction Sets within an EDI X12 Interchange.

member.name: P:ProcessLogWithFilesV1.Files
member.summary: List of files associated with this process log.

member.name: P:ProcessLogWithFilesV1.FileCount
member.summary: Count of files associated with this process log.
